remarks: Sum of a family that is nonzero at at most one point.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumpt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumpt.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumpt.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumpt.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumpt.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
gsumpt.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumpt.s $e |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) C_ { X } ) $.
gsumpt $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( F ` X ) ) $.
